name: Parthenius, Bishop of Lampsacus
hieromartyr Petro Verhun, presbyter
troparia: (Tone 4) O God of our Fathers,* who always deals with us according to Your everlasting compassion,* take not Your mercy away from us;* but through the prayers of our fathers,* guide our lives along the ways of peace.
kontakia: (Tone 3) O God-wise Parthenius, you have received the grace of miracles.* O God-bearing father, you have dispelled all the passions of the faithful,* and you have cast out the evil spirits.* Therefore, we praise you, the perfect contemplator of divine truths.
